payment_terms: Payment is due within 30 days of invoice. Amount: $50,000 per month.
renewal_clause: The contract may be renewed for an additional year upon mutual agreement.
legal_obligations: The client must provide timely access to necessary facilities. The service provider must deliver services as per the agreed SLA.
termination_conditions: Either party may terminate the contract with a 30-day written notice. Termination due to breach requires immediate notice.
